channel.title: Openspaces on Devops Gathering 2020 | March 09 - 11, 2020 in Bochum

item.title: Container Open Space
item.description: WHAT IS AN OPEN SPACE? What do you need to bring with you for the conference? -> Only you, good ideas and curiosity! :-) Where can I find more information about the open space? Here you can find definitions, videos and more information about the format open space : * https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Space * http://www.agonda.de/open-space/open-space.html * https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eZD0PtnN1vQ An Open Space is a simple and productive way for hosting knowledge events. Participants and experts will create and manage together their own agenda of parallel working sessions.
